body_html:
Here are more details:
Condition 1: Two tensors have different dimensions, and dim(a) > dim(b), easy to handle, just extend the dimension from right to left, otherwise, raise exception.
Condition 2: Two tensors have same dimension, but different shape, raise exception
Condition 3: One tensor and one constant, turn one constant into a 1d tensor.
body_text:
Here are more details:
Condition 1: Two tensors have different dimensions, and dim(a) > dim(b), easy to handle, just extend the dimension from right to left, otherwise, raise exception.
Condition 2: Two tensors have same dimension, but different shape, raise exception
Condition 3: One tensor and one constant, turn one constant into a 1d tensor.
body:
Here are more details:
Condition 1: Two tensors have different dimensions, and dim(a) > dim(b), easy to handle, just extend the dimension from right to left, otherwise, raise exception.
Condition 2: Two tensors have same dimension, but different shape, raise exception
Condition 3: One tensor and one constant, turn one constant into a 1d tensor.
